badge_template_activities.title: In the first part of this course, attendees learn how ACI addresses End-Point learning and how the control and data planes operate. Additional segmentation best-practices are also covered (e.g. ESGs, vzAny) as well as L4-L7 services integration. ACI Anywhere is also covered with specific focus on on-prem architectures and Multi-Pod and Multi-Site topologies powered by Nexus Dashboard.

The second part focuses on Cloud and how ACI for AWS and Azure automates cloud networking and normalizes networking operations anywhere. We start from how to install and enable Cloud ACI on AWS all the way to having a working configuration connecting end-points and services. Last we focus on Cloud Migration and DRaaS scenarios where we apply the learnt contents to multicloud topologies powered by Nexus Dashboard.
